title: Rest in Peace, Grandpa Stan. You've Earned It.
itunes:title: Rest in Peace, Grandpa Stan. You've Earned It.
itunes:subtitle: The Creepypasta Anthology
description:
Rest in peace...

***

Written by Mlycanthrope and narrated by Cole Burkhardt

***

Content warning: death, mentions of self harm and mental illness

***

Check out our reward tiers at patreon.com/creepypod

***

You can also subscribe to us on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/creepypod

***

Title music by Alex Aldea

***

Intro/Outro Narration by Joe Stofko


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
